title: 2.3 Master Challenge 3
question:
Cat, chicken and tac are friends. They are at different places and have decided to meet. When the (Green Flag) is tapped, they start moving. Which two characters will be at the same position when the (Green Flag) is tapped?

a. Cat and Tac
b. Chicken and Tac
c. Cat and Chicken
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
